title: Copyright and Media Law Learning Project: Enhancing Competencies Through Explicit Instruction and Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational understanding of copyright and media law concepts
context.additional_context: Process of acquiring core concepts of copyright and media law through project-based learning using digital devices, and cultivating the ability to apply them to real problem-solving situations. Aims to minimize cognitive load and improve knowledge retention through explicit instruction followed by problem-solving activities (Escape Room game)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of copyright and media law and classify real-world cases.
Learners can apply knowledge by solving copyright issues through a digital Escape Room game.
Learners can propose creative solutions to new copyright problems based on acquired knowledge.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
